Day 4 (March 25): Lubbock to Minneapolis

Note: The above costs are estimates and may vary based on actual prices and exchange rates.

Recommendations:

* Consider booking accommodations in Abilene and Lubbock that are suitable for children under 10 years old.
* Plan your itinerary to minimize travel time and cost, while ensuring you cover all the places you wish to visit.
* Keep a buffer in case of unexpected delays or changes in your travel plan.

I hope this helps you plan your trip! Let me know if you have any further questions.
